_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The message to the Buddha [mn90:18.1]: Bow with your head to his feet
Ask if he is healthy and well, nimble, strong, and living comfortably
Say: ‘Sir, King Pasenadi of Kosala will come to see you today when he has finished breakfast.’
The five factors that support meditation: Faith in the Realized One’s awakening
Live with energy roused up for giving up unskillful qualities and embracing skillful qualities
The gods (a causal chain) [mn90:18.1]: Those who are subject to affliction
Those who are free of affliction
